allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Lendaz Owner Dashboard with admin listing approvals

Features:
- Property owner dashboard with analytics, listings, messaging, maintenance, documents, and profile sections
- Admin listing approvals page with:
  - Status filtering \(All, Pending, Approved, Changes Requested, Rejected\)
  - Search by property name or owner
  - Detailed table view with thumbnails
  - Full workflow actions \(Approve, Reject, Request Changes\)
- Listing review modal with:
  - Image carousel with navigation
  - Complete property details \(specs, description, amenities\)
  - Owner information
  - Submission details and admin notes
  - Quick action buttons
- Notes editing modal for managing admin feedback
- Responsive design with SCSS modular architecture
- Vanilla JavaScript with IIFE module pattern

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive mobile responsive design

- Fix malformed media queries \(respond-below syntax errors\)
- Add hamburger menu for mobile navigation with slide-out sidebar
- Make metrics grid responsive \(2-column on mobile\)
- Make listing cards stack vertically with full-width images on mobile
- Make analytics panels single column on smaller screens
- Add mobile card layout support for documents table
- Make messaging section responsive with horizontal scrolling filters
- Make maintenance kanban columns stack on mobile
- Make profile section responsive with stacking cards
- Fix topbar, search, and user menu for mobile viewports
- Add touch-friendly 44px minimum targets
- Support minimum width of 360px \(most Android phones\)

EOF
\)")
